dcterms:creator: K. Zeng
M. D. Graham
dcterms:description: A dataset containing simulation episodes of the Kuramoto-Sivashinsky equation, used to demonstrate the findings of the paper.
dcterms:title: Kuramoto-Sivashinsky equation dataset

dcterms:creator: K. Zeng
A. J. Linot
M. D. Graham
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 100 simulation episodes, used for training and validating models in the context of controlling spatiotemporal chaos.
dcterms:title: Simulation episodes dataset (100 simulation episodes)

dcterms:creator: K. Zeng
A. J. Linot
M. D. Graham
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 40,000 snapshots used for model training and validation in the context of controlling spatiotemporal chaos.
dcterms:title: Dataset for model training and validation (40,000 snapshots)

dcterms:creator: K. Zeng
A. J. Linot
M. D. Graham
dcterms:description: A dataset used for model-based rollouts in the context of controlling spatiotemporal chaos.
dcterms:title: Dataset for model-based rollouts
